body_html: A temporary solution would be to replace exported_symbols.lds and version_script.lds in the c directory with tf_exported_symbols.lds and tf_version_script.lds. This would export all the necessary symbols in libtensorflow.so. Is there a reason not to do that for now, until the fix comes out?
body_text: A temporary solution would be to replace exported_symbols.lds and version_script.lds in the c directory with tf_exported_symbols.lds and tf_version_script.lds. This would export all the necessary symbols in libtensorflow.so. Is there a reason not to do that for now, until the fix comes out?
body: A temporary solution would be to replace `exported_symbols.lds` and `version_script.lds` in the `c` directory with `tf_exported_symbols.lds` and `tf_version_script.lds`. This would export all the necessary symbols in `libtensorflow.so`. Is there a reason not to do that for now, until the fix comes out?
